In Operation Overlord, lead the US Army's Able Company during the D-Day landings, and spearhead the charge from the beaches of Normandy. Then, direct US, British and German forces alike in the Opposing Fronts and Tales of Valor expansions, with new campaigns as well as diverse new factions to command in the hugely replayable Skirmish mode.

description: Armed Forces Corp - Mercenaries. Superbly equipped and armed, trained to fight in all conditions possible. Incredibly effective and showing no mercy to opponents. Only one thing makes them different from commandoes they fight for *. Become a commander of a mercenaries unit, hired by the government for an exceptionally difficult mission. A group of terrorists intend to steal top secret data from the computer of an influential politician. Dont let the criminals get away with the stolen documents. Terrorist Takedown 2 - Journalists have been taken prisoner! Two days after the kidnapping the government begins negotiations with the terrorists demanding the release of the captives. With the conditions being impossible to meet it would appear that there are no options left for the negotiation team. name: Kids Tetris
description: Kids Tetris is a variation of the classic Russian puzzle game geared towards children. The main characters of the game are the Minos, the pieces that make up the Tetris board. There are four locations where you can play Tetris: the circus, the fire station, the laboratory, and the haunted house. Each board requires a certain amount of lines to be cleared to win Tetris. Since the game is a variation for children, the blocks start out small and fall down slowly. As the game progresses, the pieces become more complex and they fall down faster. After you win, there are many toys and stage props that you can play with in the activity center. You can also print out coloring pages based on the game and a certificate for each stage you play. The game supports both single player and multiplayer. The game is playable with the on-screen mouse controls or the keyboard.

name: Mike's Monstrous Adventure
description:
Mike's Monstrous Adventure is a PC game released on September 2002. The game is based on Monsters, Inc. It is a point-and-click adventure game developed by Hulabee Entertaiment.

Players control Mike as he searches the factory and solve puzzles to restore the parts to the Laugh Energy Filter 5000, a laugh machine which is needed for a big press conference. Exploring the factory takes players to a variety of locations including the lobby, platform room, atrium, maintenance room, cafeteria, security booth, conference room, elevator, trash room, pipe room, tentacle room, contamination room, R&D lab, pressure control room, locker room, mailroom and more.

During the adventure, players interact with characters from the film, including Delta, Boo, Fran, Smitty, Needleman, Skip, and Wally. In addition to solving puzzles, kids are required to complete simple tasks like finishing Mike's paperwork, exploring every room in the factory to find joke cards, and maintaining a small inventory. Joke cards are used by Mike to match specific types of jokes, categorized by sports, animals, science, food, music, family, transportation, school, monsters and clown routines, with certain kids to make them laugh.

Upon completion of the first puzzle, a blueprint becomes available that shows the missing machine parts as well as a list of items that have been found. After Mike rescues Boo early in the game, players gain access to the Cereal Slide mini-game where the goal is to become the first player to line up colored cereal pieces horizontally, vertically or diagonally in a row of three (3x3 grid) or four (5x5 or 7x7 grids). Hints and gameplay instructions are included in a printable and colorful electronic manual on the CD.

Experience an adventure of intrigue, deception, and revelation that exposes an even greater threat than the Fire Nation as you battle against new enemies and master your bending skills

name: Colin McRae: Dirt 2
description:
Dirt 2 is set to take off-road racing games on DS to a new level.

Dirt 2 features exciting action-sports attitude and takes players on a stunning World Tour. Influenced by the big-event atmosphere rally is showcased in at events like the X-Games, this global tour takes players to some of the most diverse and exotic real-world locations and offers a sensational line up of officially licensed rally and off-road vehicles.

Designed from the ground up exclusively for DS, Dirt 2 is tuned for portable play including a career mode, arcade mode and a range of quick-fire challenges. Dirt 2 also comes equipped with the latest evolution of the most powerful track editor on a handheld game system. Now for the first time in 3-D, players can create and share their own unique races. With 4 player head-to-head racing supported over local wireless connection, compete and create with Dirt 2 on DS.

name: Over the Hedge
description:
In the video game, which takes place a year after the movie, RJ, Hammy, Verne, and the gang feel that they need to have more things for the log (the area behind the hedge). This leads them on a wild romp through six different areas to snatch different things such as a popcorn machine and a TV for themselves. There are several mini games as bonuses in the game.

All through the game, they try to take these things while avoiding the Sniffer, (Dwayne the Verminator), who tries to defeat them by using mind-controlled vermin he has captured as his "henchmen." At one point, many animals, including weasels, badgers, and even Vincent the bear are controlled.

Follow her journey as she tries to fight boredom in her small new town, comes across a mysterious statue whose name has been lost in time and stumbles upon perhaps the greatest adventure of her life (so far).

name: F.E.A.R.
description:
The Xbox 360 port of F.E.A.R. contains an Instant Action mode for single-player. In this mode, players are dropped into a modified level and must get to a designated point as quickly as possible whilst simultaneously killing as many enemies as possible and being as accurate as possible. Graphically, this versions is equivalent to the PC version on maximum settings with an high dynamic range lighting, an advanced particle system and HD textures. It also features an exclusive bonus level not found in the PC original, which depicts Holiday's attempt to extract Bishop from ATC headquarters. These versions also features a new weapon, dual wielded automatic handguns.

The PlayStation 3 port of F.E.A.R. features the same Instant Action mode from the Xbox 360 version. It also has its own exclusive additional weapon (a street sweeper shotgun) and bonus mission, which depicts the Delta Force recon team's journey through ATC headquarters prior to encountering Alma. Like the Xbox version, the game's native resolution was 720p, but the other enhancements were removed for this version.

name: Battlefield: Bad Company 2 - Digital Deluxe Edition
description: This edition includes Battlefield: Bad Company 2 game and Battlefield: Bad Company 2 - Vietnam expansion pack. It also features instant access to four vehicle unlockables and three weapons.

name: Amateur League Golf
description: Sin descripción

name: Amazonia
description: Sin descripción

name: Atomic Betty 2

name: Real Cricket 22
description: Sin descripción

name: Pleasurepunk: Drug Dealer
description: In Pleasurepunk: Drug Dealer you are a hacker trying to find compromised photos of a drug dealer wanted by the FBI. Destroy the blocks and see the most hot pics of her.

name: Kawaii Girl
description: The Kawaii Girl is full of cute girls! Use beautiful girls to clear several dungeons Conquer the dungeon, have a fun.The difficulty of the game is a little high. Please buy carefully!

name: No-Go
description: A dark thriller in first-person perspective. We play as Charles Wood, who has the task of espacing a city taken over by a fanatic gang.

name: Resident Evil 6: Survivors Mode
description: Adds the Survivors game mode to the Extra Content menu of Resident Evil 6! It's a battle between agents, and only the last man standing can be the victor. This mode supports up to 6-players in individual deathmatch, or team battles!

name: Marriage to the Demon Wife!
description: An erotic VR fantasy romance simulation game set in medieval Japan! This is a VR game (also playable on desktop) where you can fall in love with a demon girl whose appearance you can customize to your liking, and even do naughty things with her.

name: Unknown Garden
description: This game is a block puzzle that connects male and Female. This game includes sexual expression by pixel art. When you completed the game you will see a female nude image.

name: Kapitan Pronin: Odin protiv vseh
description: An interactive fiction game Captain Pronin: One Against All originally released for the PC, and later unofficially to PlayStation. The adventure quest has 400 endings and 200 animated scenes, its graphics has the similar style as the cartoon series, and the text contains humor, jokes and allusions to various foreign and domestic pop culture references.

name: Desert Lost
description: This is a third person action game. Players are surrounded by monsters and are free to explore the surrounding area. Players must avoid monster attacks or kill them to survive.

name: Cut
description: "Cut" is a story about the self, the protagonist will explore in a dark and dreamy world, cutting the plant that brings pain to this world - Ner.

name: SpeedRunners: Youtuber Pack 2
description: Play as PewDiePie, Strippin, CinnamonToastKen, or Dodger in this Youtuber DLC pack for SpeedRunners!

name: Hentai Crazy Girls
description: This is the puzzle with a several levels of difficulty and beautiful artbook. All characters appearing in this game are over 18 years of age.

name: Grave Prosperity: The Vestigial Princess
description: Solve deadly puzzles and fend off disturbing creatures with a combination of hack n slash combat, OTS gunplay, and supernatural powers, all while piecing together the clues of your identity that are scattered about the area.

name: Naked Porn Battle
description: Katya is a badass fighter. She organizes championships in the darkest places in the world to attract a diverse audience. Basically, fights always take place between women. Men don't participate in the fights.

name: Intertwined Fate with a Cat Demon
description: The human, Yi, was accidentally infected by a “blood cicada” on the road and ran into Hitomi, a cat demon who was hunting the blood cicada. Faced by Yi, the human who was scared and also infected, the cat demon chose to stay with Yi, in order to protect and to observe her…

name: VR Mini Bowling 2
description: Welcome to the world of Mini Bowling! In this VR game bowling meets mini golf to create a totally new experience! VR Mini Bowling 2 also brings the addition of Powerups, which completely change the way the game is played!

name: Paradise Beach Girls
description: A relaxing Visual Novel in which you meet and talk with 5 different girls on a vacation in Miami.

name: Pleasure Airlines
description: Erotic adventure in the hottest flight ever!

name: Anime Gas Station
description: Relaxing puzzle game with cute gas station girls.

name: Kokorogawari Fantasy
description: Welcome to Kokorogawari's alternate world - Kokorogawari Fantasy! This is a comedic little RPG featuring the main cast of Kokorogawari. It's a great way to have some silly fun after playing through the serious main game!

name: Milk Bottle and Monster Girl 2
description: "Moke Bottle and Monster Girl 2" is a shooting game that avoids monsters and breaks the target point. There will be 5 monsters in each level. Players can control the Moke bottle to avoid monsters and break the target point to clear the level.

name: Pandemic: The Virus Outbreak
description: Are you good enough to make your country overcome the pandemic? Try it out! You're the president of a new country, In 1/1/2020 a pandemic started and you have to manage the country balancing 8 constantly chaging statistics using isolation measures or budget investments.

name: Glitch Puzzle
description: Glitch Puzzle is a classical puzzle in unusual anime style.

name: Rune II: God Slayer Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Rune II: Berserker Rage Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: The Surge 2: Limited Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Warhammer: Vermintide 2 - Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Rive: Orange Box Limited Edition
description: This edition includes the following Rive Collector’s Box, Game Disc, Game Manual, Double-Disc Soundtrack by SonicPicnic, Numbered Certificate

name: Rive: Blue Box Limited Edition
description: This edition includes the following Rive Collector’s Box, Game Disc, Game Manual, Rive Double-Disc Soundtrack by SonicPicnic, Numbered Certificate

name: Ancestor's Legacy: Conqueror's Edition
description:
Ancestors Legacy is a history-inspired, real-time strategy game influenced by historical events in the Middle Ages. The game combines resource management and base building with large-scale, squad-based battles across vast battlefields, all rendered in superb detail with Unreal Engine 4. Experience medieval bloodshed like never before thanks to the cinematic action camera that puts you right in the middle of the battle at the press of a button.

Conqueror's Edition includes:
- Ancestors Legacy full version
- Exclusive Art Book
- Soundtrack

name: Call of Duty: Black Ops III - Game of the Year Edition
description: Call of Duty: Black Ops III - Game of the Year Edition released only in Japan.

name: Dragon's Lair II: Time Warp
description: Home ports of the game were announced for the Philips CD-i, 3DO Interactive Multiplayer, and Jaguar CD. However, only the CD-i version was actually released, though non-playable demos of the 3DO and Jaguar CD versions appear on those consoles' respective versions of Brain Dead 13.

name: Shtdn
description:
The desktop is peaceful as usual.
In order to delete the computer virus called "Agape", the anti-virus program, Virus Buster "Goyou", must cooperate with it while searching through the computer's files.

name: Paws & Claws Pampered Pets 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Silver Thread
description: An exorcist that doubts the existence of ghost might sound contradictory but to Alicia Wilkershire, this is the right way to get closer to the truth. Her latest job sounded like another run-of-the-mill case and she greeted her client with her usual pessimism but is it, really?

name: Kono Warui Koneko-chan-me!
description: A new style action game sync with sounds and effects from Xeen in Japan.

name: Germinal
description: Help Greg stay healthy during an epidemic as he jumps, hovers and cleans his way through quarantine with his disinfectant jetpack.Witness his developing mysophobia(fear of contamination) express itself in the increasingly difficult game play, and replay the game to master the mechanics or search for more story bits.

name: Merge Clash
description: Merge Clash is an awesome tower defense game where you build and deploy dozens of unique and powerful towers to defend your castle. Fight off endless waves of enemies in competitive multiplayer or in Co-op. But remember! Combining towers has an equal chance of increasing your power, or creating a random merged tower!

name: Euro Train Simulator
description: Euro Train Simulator is the first in a planned series of high-quality, feature-rich railroad simulation games covering every major destination in the world. Featuring an intuitive, easy to use interface, the game lets users play Career Mode to accomplish each scenario and unlock new trains and routes. Career accomplishments are featured on a leader board. On the other hand, Quick Mode lets you choose the train, route, source and destination stations, weather and the time of the day for the simulation.

name: Euro Train Simulator 2
description: Euro Train Sim 2 is the first mobile train simulator to feature officially-licensed real trains from German train operator Deutsche Bahn. The locomotives have been authentically recreated with maximum attention to detail. Features stations from Germany and France and official DB licensed trains including the world famous ICE3, DB142 and a range of freight trains.

name: Sonic 1/2 2013 Decompilation
description: A decompilation for Sonic 1 & 2 (the remastered versions), making them playable on computers, since the original releases were only for mobile platforms. The mod also comes with a built-in mod loader.

name: Sonic CD 2011 Decompilation
description: A decompilaton of Sonic CD (the 2011 remaster version, using the mobile version as a basis) for computers. This mod adds a built-in mod loader and technical improvements over the officially released version of the remaster for PC.

name: Alnahsha Run
description:
Join the most intense chase through the streets of the city of Riyadh, Cairo, and soon Dubai in the endless runner Alnahsha Run.

Take the runner boy safely through the city, run as fast as possible, dodge the challenging obstacles, use the powerful boosters, jump up or slide down to escape your father, and complete missions to earn coins and increase your multiplier.

name: .ExE
description: .ExE is an English Yume Nikki fangame. It stars Carrie, a girl who refused to leave her apartment. .ExE involves entering a dream world through the protagonist's computer, with Carrie clicking on an application. Carrie takes on a different form in the dream world. The main objective is exploration and collecting effects.

name: Poena
description: Poena is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. You play as a boy named Kasetsuki who refuses to leave his room for unknown reasons. The main objective of the game is to explore the dream world and collect all the effects (known as :Culpa:).

name: Amillusion
description:
Amillusion is a Yume Nikki fangame by the Team Compote. You play Danaë, who tries to stay awake reading a photo album. Explore her crazy and surrealistic dreams to find the "Keys".

Sometimes, eccentricity can hide darker things...

name: Another Way
description: Another Way is an English Yume Nikki fangame. You play as Drake, a mad scientist who has trapped himself in his lab. He can explore his subconscious via the teleporter in his lab. Another Way is a traditional-styled fangame where the player explores the dream world and collect effects called Experiments in game. Experiments are used with the Shift key, and the player can return to the Lab at any time with the Return button from the main menu. An interesting thing about the Experiments is that each one has it's own face portrait, save for a few.

name: August 31
description: August 31 is a Chinese Yume Nikki fangame. It stars Huá Jū. It plays like most Yume Nikki fangames, except that there are some events that have dialogue with other characters and it has little to no music.

name: Blooms
description:
blooms is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. It stars two characters, Nonoka and Kiribana. The point of the game is to sleep in the bed and collect effects while dreaming. You always start off as Nonoka but can switch characters at any point. In Nonoka's bedroom, there is a music box where the player can access a sound test with unlockable tracks. In Kiribana's bedroom there is a minigame on her bookshelf called Little RPG.

Most of the time, it doesn't really matter which character the player controls, since the dream worlds are the same for both characters and effects are even shared in both of their inventories once collected. However there are a few situations where one character can do one thing where the other refuses or is unable to do the same thing.

Along with collecting effects, there are 3 additional menu types to be found hidden throughout the dream world.

name: Circuitdream.exe
description:
circuitdream.exe is a Yume Nikki fangame made as a crossover with the anime series Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's.
The game features Antinomy and his twin younger brother Bruno. Bruno is in the hospital and it is up to Ant to find out what happened to him by exploring his brother's mind using the mysterious program "circuitdream.exe". By exploring Bruno's mind, Ant learns a lot about his brother that he never knew, as well as things about himself.
So, what could have happened? Is Bruno sick? Was he in an accident? Or was he trying to commit suicide? Antinomy will find out and surely save him!

name: Corallo
description:
Corallo is a Yume Nikki fangame. The main focus is exploring "dreams" and collecting "effects", which can be purely cosmetic or make the character perform certain actions.

Corallo focuses on Maya, a young woman stuck on a wheelchair and locked in a room. She can only stare at the ocean in front of her window and daydream.
By interacting with her mind, the player can learn more about her and her past, and what lead her to be stuck in her current room.

name: Cyclothymic
description: Cyclothymic is an English Yume Nikki fangame. You play as a girl named Koji who refuses to leave her room, exploring a world she enters by reading her notebook. Like most fangames, the main objective is exploration.

name: Distress
description: Distress is a Yume Nikki fangame made for the 4th Dream Diary Jam. Help Saya find the effects, there are a total of 11. You can mix up all the effect together, making a total of 55 mixes.

name: Dream?
description: Dream? is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. The game features two playable characters: yuki and Aritsuki. Along with effects, Memories (思い出) can be collected that will change some areas in the dream world.

name: Dream Sequences
description: Dream Sequences is a Yume Nikki fangame. Like other fangames, the game involves exploring the dream world and collecting effects. In this game effects are obtainable items which disappear after equipping them from the menu. In order to activate the effect again, you need to collect it again.

name: Apple Shooter
description: Apple Shooter is an archery game that will test your skills as an Indian warrior. Being a sharp-shooter is what this game needs since the life of your friend depends on how well you target the apple. Every time you hit the apple, the distance between you and your friend will be farther. Also, there will be some sort of a barricade to make the difficulty more advanced. Your friend's life is at risk. There's no room for mistakes so be brave and be sharp enough to target the apple and try not to kill your dear friend. Take your time in controlling the power and direction of the bow to perfect the shot and save your friend.

name: Dreams of Dead
description: Dreams of Dead is a Russian Yume Nikki fangame. It's an exploration adventure horror game with a few puzzles. You play as a girl named Aya who wakes up in the hospital for unknown reasons.

name: Idle Huntress: Adventure
description: Sin descripción

name: Dugashoba!
description: DuGaSHoBa! is a Yume Nikki fangame. It is the sequel to Nightmare Castle. It stars a girl named Maho. DuGaSHoBa! is a traditional fangame with the goal being exploration and effect collection.

name: Espacio
description: Espacio is a traditional Yume Nikki fangame. You explore the dreams of the protagonist, Via lattea.

name: Friendly
description: Friendly is a Chinese Yume Nikki fangame. It stars Huán Xíng Zǐ and the goal is to explore her dream world.

name: The Sims 4: Moonlight Chic Kit
description: With The Sims 4 Moonlight Chic Kit, Simmers can discover new styles and dress up for a night to remember in the City of Love! Inspired by Parisian designer Paola Locatelli and today’s youth fashions, these new looks are perfect for all the experiences a Sim will encounter during a night out on the town.

name: Sonic Bash
description:
A multiplayer-only ROM hack of Sonic the Hedgehog.

Two players select a character (one being Sonic and the other being Tails) and both battle it out to try to gain as many hits on Eggman. The catch is that Eggman only gets destroyed when the timer runs down to 0 (unless it's a draw at that time, then, it will wait for another hit). The player with the most hits at the end of the timer wins. The player can also win if the other player dies before the timer runs out (if respawn mode is off).

name: Sonic the Hedgehog 2
description: Sonic the Hedgehog 2 is an LCD game created by Tiger Electronics in 1993. The background image used in the game is Oil Ocean Zone, from the 16-bit version of Sonic the Hedgehog 2.

name: The Sims 4: Little Campers Kit
description: The Sims 4 Little Campers Kit encourages Sims to explore and enjoy the great outdoors with cozy and cunning camping gear. Sims can play outdoor games from the safety of their DIY blanket fort, with a collection that offers everything a family needs for a night of creative fun!

name: Pocket Crystal League
description:
PCL is a Poke-card game, although completely different to the Official Trading Card Game. The gameplay mechanics were partially inspired by Inscryption, being pretty straightforward and easy to learn.

After choosing a starter deck, your goal is to travel through Kyoumu, challenging each of the Gym Leaders from the eight major cities in the region, building up your team to reach the ultimate goal, the Crystal League. Along the way, you'll be presented with numerous choices to expand your deck, strengthen your cards, give them unique special abilities, and battle other trainers.

The current release includes all of gens 1 and 2 (but with corresponding Fairy types). The game may be expanded with more content and generations in the future, but there are no plans currently for it. It is fully playable in its current state.

name: V Burster
description:
Awesome New Action Shooting game!!

"My name is iiiv (eve). Virus is detected in your smart phone.Let's clean them!!"

Created with future technology "human type anti virus, iiiv" Let's clean with a virus!

name: Basil Goes O.U.T.S.I.D.E.
description: Basil does not usually like to leave his house. He thought he went to his comfy, safe bed as usual last night, now why’d he wake up in some dark cave in the middle of nowhere?

name: Arcade Legends: Sega Genesis Volume 3 - Super Sonic Gold
description: Arcade Legends: Sega Genesis Volume 3 is a game console which is part of the Play TV Legends series. There is no cartridge port but four games are available which include: Sonic the Hedgehog, Sonic the Hedgehog 2, Sonic Spinball, and Dr. Robotnik's Mean Bean Machine.

name: Black Sheep
description:
In the future, robots cater to man’s every want and need. That is, unless you’re a lowly line cook like Irene Turnsole. After Irene travels to her late father’s home, she discovers that her sister has gone missing and nobody is coming to help find her. To solve the mystery, Irene must dig into the secrets of her father’s corporation, a world on the edge of the Singularity, and her family's own painful past – before precious time runs out.

A cyberpunk point-and-click mystery brought to Twine.

name: Blood Under the Bridge
description: Twine game about being 15 during the 2010 World Cup.

name: FunPlay 20-in-1
description: Freetron's FunPlay 20-in-1, is a Plug and Play game console released in 2009, licensed by Atgames (who exclusively manages Sega's first party platform game library), and manufactured and distributed by Freetron. It's very similar in design to PlayPal Plug & Play (including the same button layout) and by being a Sega Master System / Game Gear emulator. Though they share a significant number of games, they differ by using 3 AAA batteries and a directional pad instead of a joystick.

name: Ampere
description:
On a night in 1898 a whole City turned pitch dark. As a young girl you know that you shouldn’t play frivolously with electricity. But this time you find yourself alone in the dark. Bravely, you’re taking the task to reconnect the power.

Discover the secrets of the underground city as you enlighten it one room after another. Can you face the shadows and return the light?

name: Sonic the Hedgehog Chaos & Spinball
description: Sonic the Hedgehog Chaos & Spinball is one of the plug in play games created by Techno Source. It requires 3 AA batteries. Two games are included, which are Sonic Chaos and Sonic Spinball.

name: Sonic Blast
description: Sonic Blast is one of the plug in play game consoles created by Techno Source. It requires 3 AA batteries. Only one game is included, which is the Game Gear version of Sonic Blast.

name: Blue Bayou
description: Embody a crawdad caught in a web of usury. Defend yourself from sinister swamp things as you fight to erase your debts.

name: PlayPal Plug & Play
description:
The PlayPal Plug & Play is a "console on a chip" manufactured by AtGames in 2006. It has twenty built-in Sega Master System and Sega Game Gear games.

The console is shaped like the head of Sonic the Hedgehog and doubles up as a game controller, with two face buttons and a joystick shaped like Sonic's fist. This unusual design is unique to the PlayPal, though similar shells were also used for the Genesis Gencore and Fun Play 20-in-1.

name: Mega Drive Twin Pads
description: The Mega Drive Twin Pads is a Mega Drive "console on a chip" originally produced by AtGames for the Asian market with 5 built-in games and distributed in Europe by Blaze Europe with 10 games. One of the two game controllers plugs directly into a television, however it will only output a PAL signal. There is no cartridge slot, so you are limited to the 10 games. Four AA batteries are needed to operate the console.

name: Mega Drive Twin Pads
description: The European version of Mega Drive Twin Pads has more games than the one released in Asia.

name: Burgerline
description: A rhythm-based burger assembly simulator.

name: Cannonhead Clash
description: You play as one of two Cannonheads - Player 1 is red, Player 2 is blue. Your goal is simple- hit the other player with one of your bombs to knock them into the water! The terrain can be destroyed by your bombs, too. Keep that in mind!

name: Ceilings
description: A bite-sized horror text-adventure game for the Bite-Sized Horror Text Game Jam.

name: Wizardish
description: A first-person grid-based oldschool mini dungeon crawler inspired by Wizardry/Ultima, created in PICO-8.

name: Chickenswamp
description: A puzzle game about a chicken in a swamp.

name: Marvel Snap
description:
Marvel Snap: The fastest card battler in the multiverse!

Build your Marvel dream team in this fast-paced, action-packed, collectible card game available on Mobile and PC.

name: Click Miner
description: The game takes place on an 8x8 grid, representing a layer of top-soil, and you play as The Click Miner. Your task is to hunt/click for the Magic Square, helped by mystical Arrows Of Mystery. Upon discovering (/clicking) the Magic Square, the soil is dug up around the area, revealing another layer of... who knows what? Only YOU can discover, as you go Deeper and Deeper into the Clicking World Of Click Miner.

name: Clouds Holidays Expo
description: It's the Big Day, Today is the first day of Clouds Holidays Expo. We hope you will spend a great time among us.

name: Club Penguin Online
description:
Club Penguin Online was an online multiplayer game that aimed to recreate the original Club Penguin experience.

The game was shut down in May 2020 by the City of London Police and Disney, after allegations of illegal activity against the games owner, Riley, had surfaced.

name: Tower of Hell
description: Take on the challenge and experience high-tension platforming action in Tower Of Hell! Jump your way upward in your quest for freedom, but be careful: A single wrong jump can mean a high drop downward.... and there's long way down...

name: Sonic 1 Beta Remake
description: Sonic 1 Beta Remake is a Sonic 1 hack created by Mistergambit. The hack has all of the Sonic 1 levels redesigned to look like their prototype counterparts, as seen in various magazine screen shots. This hack also has new objects, such as a functioning Splats, the checkered ball that was scrapped from GHZ, and more. To make it seem more like a genuine prototype, some levels are made to look unfinished.

name: Loathful
description: Loathful is a Survival Horror in first person with PS1 graphics. Bring yourself in a retro-style adventure where all your nightmares are brought to life. Survive your demons, dive into your darkest fears to overthrow a mysterious virus who seems to have put his hands on this universe.

name: Two's
description: When most people think of card games one of the first that comes to mind is probably Two's the Dos card game. All would have probably played Two's the Dos card game at least once in their lives. The basic premise of the game is to play cards from your hand that either match the number or color of the last played card.

name: Mario Kart: Double Dash!! Wii
description: Mario Kart: Double Dash!! Wii is a Mario Kart Wii hack that recreates courses from Mario Kart: Double Dash!!.

name: Sonic Mania: Blazey Mix Plus Moveset!
description: Sonic Mania: Blazey Mix Plus Moveset! is a mod for Sonic Mania Plus that replaces Sonic with Blaze the Cat. The mod also adds in a unique play-style for Blaze, which includes a double jump and a fire shield that can be activated for 20 rings.

name: Genso Nikki
description:
Genso Nikki is a fan made tribute to the Japanese indie game: Yume Nikki

Play as a boy trapped in his room. If you dare, turn out the lights and explore his mind. Collect effects to alter his appearance and powers, enabling him to access new areas, who know what you might find!

name: Glemsomhet
description: Glemsomhet is a Yume Nikki fangame. You play as Eldrid, someone who refuses to leave their room and uses a box-like artifact to travel to another world and explores their "dream" world seeking effects.

name: Hope
description: Hope is a Chinese Yume Nikki fangame and it stars Cheryl. It plays like a traditional fangame. you sleep in the bed and dream, searching for effects. Additionally, you can see various illustrations by interacting with the book on the carpet.

name: Iter Itineris
description:
Ava Garde was a normal blonde girl until an incident with a mysterious, otherworldly monster. The creature snatched up Beatrice, her friend, and then mutated Ava into a halfling with red hair and green blood. The next day, she could not remember the events, but she did recall her friend being taken. A portal suddenly appeared inside her home. Without any other choice, she went inside and into the Externus, looking for her lost friend.

Iter Itineris is an English Yume Nikki fangame where you play as Ava Garde as you explore the unknown and bizarre realms of the Externus, the goal being to explore the worlds in the Externus and collect all the XenoVisions.

name: Journal Diary
description:
Ichitsuki is a boy with lemon-shaped hair who can't seem to leave his room for some reason, he just backs away from the door out of his hallway. Poor kid, maybe his dreams will tell us what's wrong, in some strange cryptic way?

This game is a Yume Nikki fangame. There are two types of collectibles in this fangame; effects and memories. Can you tell which type is good or bad?

name: Journey Record
description: jourNEY REcord is a Chinese Yume Nikki fangame, starring Reney. The main goal is to explore her dream world and find all the effects.

name: Kaeri Yume
description: Kaeri Yume is a Japanese Yume Nikki Fangame. The game's protagonist is H2O, a girl traveling alone in a bus. Kaeri Yume is a traditional fangame, the player can explore the various dream worlds and collect effects.

name: Kross
description: Kross is a Yume Nikki fangame. It stars a girl named Zugaikotsuki. She's asleep from the start and the objective is to explore the dream world and collect effects.

name: Kyoku Yume
description: Kyoku Yume is a Yume Nikki fangame and it stars Kyukotsuki. The goal is to explore the dream world.

name: Limbo
description: Limbo is an English Yume Nikki fangame. Limbo plays like a traditional fangame, the goal of the game is to explore Annie's dream world and find effects.

name: PMFighter
description: PMFighter is a fighting game inspired by Punch Out that is based around the 2022 Australian election.

name: Grand Theft Auto: Anime
description: Grand Theft Auto: Anime is an unlicensed mod of Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas that changes the game to be based around various anime, with edits to the character models, audio and the overall map.

name: Dodgy Boat
description: A dodgy boat. A congested canal. Make bank & avoid banks in this meme-y endless runner!

name: Blaze the Cat Dress Up
description: Sin descripción

name: Strange Aeons
description: This is an atmospheric map set (45 levels) based on the works of H P Lovecraft, and inspired by a Doom clone I designed when I was a kid. Reunite with your dead son by traveling through your dreams and conquering four nightmarish realms: a shattered planet floating in aether, a dilapitated fortress of the future, the badlands of prehistoric earth, and the frozen Plateau of Leng. Now includes a fifth bonus episode, Out of the Aeons, set in the Underworld and the City of R’lyeh!

name: The Sims 3: Starter Pack
description: A compilation of The Sims 3, The Sims 3: Late Night, The Sims 3: High-End Loft Stuff, and Date Night set from The Sims 3 Store.

name: Mass Effect 2: Digital Deluxe Edition
description: Includes Mass Effect 2 game, digital soundtrack, The Making of Mass Effect 2 videos, digital art book, Cerberus Network code, digital Mass Effect Redemption #1 comic, Collector Armor and Assault Rifle, and Incisor Rifle.

name: Mass Effect 2: Normandy Crash Site
description: Normandy Crash Site is a DLC pack for Mass Effect 2 that was released with the game's launch. Explore the crash site of the SSV Normandy as Commander Shepard is asked by Alliance Command to explore the site and recover the remains of missing crew members and place a monument on the site. Alliance Command wants Shepard to be the first to walk on the site as Shepard was the vessel's last commanding officer.

name: Mass Effect: Genesis
description: Mass Effect: Genesis is a downloadable "interactive backstory comic". Genesis fills the role of Mass Effect for new players by introducing them to the story of the original game and allowing them to make six of the major plot decisions that players could make. If downloaded, the comic appears between the opening level and character customization. There are two versions of the comic, one each for a male and female Commander Shepard.

name: Mass Effect 2: Cerberus Network
description: An online downloadable content and news service that enables free bonus content for the game. New purchases of Mass Effect 2 are provided with a one-time use access code that unlocks the game's Cerberus Network. However, users who buy the game used have to pay for the Cerberus Network separately if they want access to the bonus content.

name: Mass Effect: Genesis 2
description: Mass Effect: Genesis 2 is an "interactive backstory comic". It is an updated version of Mass Effect: Genesis, which was originally created for Mass Effect 2. Genesis 2 fills the role of Mass Effect and Mass Effect 2 for new players to the series, introducing them to the story of the first two games in the Mass Effect trilogy and allowing them to make some of the major plot decisions that players could make by playing through the previous games. The player is prompted to begin Genesis 2 after character creation, but using it is optional. There are two versions of the comic, one each for a male and female Commander Shepard.

name: Matsurikki
description: Matsurikki is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. It stars Maritsuki, a girl in a yukata. The goal is to explore her dreams.

name: Mimi
description: Mimi is a Yume Nikki fangame. This game focuses around Mimi, a young girl who has out-of-body experiences. The game's graphics, uniquely, are drawn purely in black and white. Mimi lacks music, and uses sound effects entirely from the RPG Maker RTP.

name: Monotose
description: Monotose is a short Yume Nikki fangame. The game stars a shut-in named Lex exploring his dream world through sleeping in his bed. Unlike most fangames, the maps aren't looping.

name: One-Way
description: One-WAY is a Yume Nikki fangame. It stars a girl named Alyssa. The goal is to explore her dreams and collect effects.

name: P.S.Rose
description: P.S.Rose is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. You play as Baratsuki and explore several worlds outside of her bedroom with the objective of collecting effects, all of them relating to flowers or plants.

name: Permafrost
description: Permafrost is a game starring Morana, a young girl who can't leave her room yet. The main objective being collecting effects in her dream world.

name: Phobia
description: Phobia is a Chinese Yume Nikki fangame. It stars Yǐng Zi (影子), a girl who refuses to leave her room and prefers to explore her dreams instead of reality.

name: Re:Vessel
description: Re:Vessel is an English Yume Nikki fangame. You play as Resa and explore a strange dream world. The goal is to explore and collect effects.

name: Yami no Ryuuou Hadesu no Monshou
description: Casio's Yami no Ryūō Hadesu no Monshō is a clone of Konami's Knightmare. In this top-view game you control a brave and handsome knight, Leon, that has to shoot bullets at various types of enemies. Shooting a series of enemies can grant you invulnerability or a shield. You have to avoid obstacles and shoot at them at the same time because they can contain power-ups for your weapons. At the end of each level is an end boss that has to be defeated before you can continue to the next level.

name: Re Rive
description: Re Rive is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. You explore the dreams of 774 and collect effects.

name: Super Vadimka III: Enter ALJ
description: Super Vadimka III: Enter ALJ is a horror-themed, side-scrolling action-platformer developed by VadimBallzGames, released on May 10, 2022, for Windows. The game was created over a span of five months and serves as a sequel to its predecessors, Super Vadimka and Super Vadimka II: Revenge of Dr. Kulik. In this third installment of the Super Vadimka series, players will navigate through daunting cliffs inspired by classic horror elements. The game introduces unique mechanics, such as the ability to throw blue balls and sticks at enemies, along with combatting bosses while striving to endure terrifying scenarios. Players can make use of save functionalities with the F5 and F6 keys, allowing them to track their progress throughout their gaming experience.

name: Remedy
description: Remedy is an English fangame made by Isasapiens. You play as Hareta, a girl stuck in her bedroom. In the protagonist's bedroom there are two medicine bottles, one of which she must use before sleeping. You will be taken to one of the two main dream worlds based on which medicine you took before sleeping. Remedy is a traditional fangame, with the goal being to explore and find effects.

name: Repentance
description: Repentance is an English Yume Nikki fangame. You play as a girl named Latanie who refuses to leave her room, so she explores her own dreams instead. Like most fangames, the main objective is to explore the protagonist's dream world and collect effects.

name: Reverse Dream
description: Reverse Dream is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. The main goal of the game is to explore Guratsuki's dream worlds and collect effects (called Images (イメージ) in this game). Interestingly, each effect is based on a certain way of dying, with each effect having 死 (lit. Death) in its name.

name: Rucida's Dream
description: Rucidia's Dream is an English Yume Nikki fangame. You explore the dreams of the protagonist, Rucidia. The goal is to explore and collect all of the effects to access the ending.

name: Sewage
description: Sewage is a Chinese Yume Nikki fangame. You play a girl named Xuán Wō Zǐ. Like other fangames, the objective of the game is to explore the dream world and collect Items. Goods don't change the protagonist's form or do anything at all. Rather, they seem to be memories from the protagonist's past.

name: Sister's Dream
description:
Sister's Dream, also known by its original name Art de Reve, is an English Yume Nikki fangame where you explore the deep dreams of a girl named Guretsuki.

Guretsuki is a typical 19 year-old hikikomori girl who doesn't want to leave her room. Throughout the dream world are various effects that'll allow you to trigger certain events, or make exploring your dreams a lot easier. Be careful while exploring, however, for the deeper you go, the darker your dreams get...

name: Cerasus
description: Our good man, Reshnha, has been trapped in a world of dreams via an unknown force, and now he must escape by finding all the songs, strewn across a land composed of a pastiche of his own thoughts, memories and actions.

name: Sity
description: Sity is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. The game stars Mutsuki, a boy who cannot leave his room. The goal is to collect 16 effects in the dream world to unlock the various endings. This game has many elements related to modern cities and earthquakes.

name: Soul Song
description: Soul Song is a Chinese Yume Nikki fangame. The game plays much like other fangames, with the player's objective being to explore Mukuro's dream world via sleeping in the bed.

name: Drunk As I Like: Gensokyo Chugging Contest
description:
Compete in a frantic drinking competition against Gensokyo's residents,
try to keep your arms steady so you don't spill anything!

name: The Red Sea
description: The Red Sea is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. You play as Nagi, a boy who stays in his room. The goal of the game is to explore and find effects.

name: Threshold
description: Threshold is an English Yume Nikki fangame. The protagonist is a boy named Hideko, who refuses to leave his room. The goal is to collect effects.

name: Friday Night Funkin': Banbuds vs. Reggie the Rat
description: A funny mod of Friday Night Funkin where Banbuds rap-battle against Reggie The Rat on the computer screen, to the tune of “Infant Destroyer”.

name: Umbra
description:
Umbra is a Yume Nikki fangame. It stars Scott, a boy who gets trapped inside his home due to a storm. The main focus of the game is exploring his dream world.

Umbra is the first game to use talk sprites, as well as the first to make dialogue an important gameplay element. The gameplay is traditional where the player is collecting effects, but with more puzzles and having dialogue choices affect the game.

name: Unknown Exist
description: Unknown Exist is a traditional Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. It stars a girl named Kaede, who refuses to leave her room. The objective is exploration and collecting effects in order to achieve an ending.

name: Untitled One
description: Untitled One is a Yume Nikki fangame. You explore Sydney's dreams when you fall asleep.

name: Uotamuosu
description: Uotamuosu is a Yume Nikki fangame. It stars three protagonists: Shiwasu, Bill and Takatsuki. Each one of them has his own locations and stories. You have to go through Shiwasu's scenario first, then Bill's and finally, Takatsuki's.

name: Usagi
description: Usagi is an English Yume Nikki fangame. In this game, the player takes control over a girl named Umiko as she explores her dreams. Once in the dream world, Umiko can visit numerous surreal worlds, find effects that change her appearance (and give her new abilities) and collect Mementos, which are needed in order to complete the game. While exploring the dream world, the player is encouraged to interpret the different events, locations and NPCs he/she encounters to uncover Umikos backstory.

name: Void
description: Void is a Chinese Yume Nikki fangame. You play as yukiko, a girl who can't/doesn't leave her bedroom. The objective is to explore the dream world and collect effects.

name: Yasumeru
description: Yasumeru is a Yume Nikki fangame. This game stars Yasashi, a boy living in a small house on a hill. The goal is to explore and collect effects. After waking up, you can see the time of day changes every time you sleep. It cycles from morning, to afternoon, to night, to dusk, then back to morning. There is also a small chance of rain when you wake up.

name: YumeSD
description: YumeSD is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. The goal of the game is to explore Tsukiai's dreams and find effects.

name: Boogie Woogi Jungle
description: Boogie Woogi Jungle is an action game, where your character must collect a number of objects scattered around each screen before the timer runs out. Most of the objects are on ledges, requiring climbing up ladders and across rope bridges. Other characters are also running around the screen, and must be avoided to prevent losing a life. Graphically and game-play wise, it is very similar to Lode Runner, except that instead of digging holes to temporarily trap your pursuers, you can fire either horizontally or vertically to stun them.

name: Yume Iro
description:
Yume Iro is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame, inspired by two games at once - Yume Nikki, and a derived, but unrelated work, Witoru. Just like the original Witoru and its few fangames, this work's design is minimalistic and ​also contains various parodies and references to Japanese pop culture.

In this game, the player takes the role of a girl named Otetsuki who cannot leave her room. As with most traditional Yume Nikki fangames, the player's objective is to collect effects and explore the dream worlds.

name: Yume Nikki: Solitude
description: Yume Nikki: Solitude is an English Yume Nikki fangame produced by Uboachan. You play as Kazenori in what seems like a hospital. When he falls asleep, you are taken to his dream world. All of the effects are available for you to use and there are only a handful of rooms to explore.

name: Scotty Goes to Centrelink
description:
A surreal horror adventure starring Australia's 30th Prime Minister.

Help a newly unemployed Scott Morrison navigate the hellish welfare system that he helped build.

name: Yume Shoko
description: Yume Shoko is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. It stars Sudou. Along the way to collecting effects, there are also 3 bonus "Omake" effects.

name: Demencia
description: Demencia is a Yume Nikki fangame. You play as a girl named Miko, and enter a dream world through reading books on a pillow.

name: Dickme Dicki
description: Dickme Dicki is a Yume Nikki fangame. It stars a certain man, who has green hair and closed eyes. He appears to be a palette swap of Miserere's protagonist. The game was intended to be a joke, with some blatant criticisms of developers' shortcomings.

name: The Final Hours of Mass Effect 3
description: Sin descripción

name: DreamDayKi
description:
DreamDayKi is an English Yume Nikki fangame. It was made as an April Fool's joke, satirizing fangames that are essential re-skins of Yume Nikki.

DreamDayKi plays exactly like Yume Nikki, but with recolored graphics, different music playing in different locations, several new areas and an additional ending.

name: Dry
description:
Dry is a Yume Nikki fangame. The dream gameplay involves exploration and collecting effects, called "Tracks" in this game. The main part of the game also has some dialogue, but is not the main focus. Dry is drawn in mostly grey shades, making it look somewhat depressing.

Dry is about an alcoholic deer named Dry, who had recently graduated from college and is about to enter university. The game begins with him sitting in a pub and asking the bartender for another drink, but he talks him out of it and tells him to go home.

The problem is Dry is far away from home right now, as his father gave him a CD that should help him to overcome his addiction. His father said that Dry should be far away from home for it to work, so he took a tent and traveled to the place where the game starts.

name: Flux
description: You play as Maria, a 23-year-old working at the local psychiatric hospital Cohibeo, tending to a delusional patient named Youshitsuki. You are able to explore her mind through her TV.

name: Yu-Gi-Oh!: Duelingbook
description: Duelingbook is a Yu-Gi-Oh! Trading Card Game simulator that works right in your browser.

name: Himi Nikki
description: Himi Nikki is a Yume Nikki fangame starring Waka. Waka is a music student. For some reason she finds herself terrified to go out of her bedroom. Listening to her Music Box makes her fall under the effect of a spell cast over it. There are 3 endings, one of them is the "true end" and the other two are bad ends.

name: MixiM
description: MixiM is a Yume Nikki fangame. The game stars Chie, a girl searching for Effects in order to manipulate her dream world. Through wearing certain effects, areas can change in appearance and show gateways to new locations. Dialogue (including symbols and website names) is used throughout the game to explain the situation of Chie and the dream world.

name: Physicality
description:
Physicality is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. You play as Katatsuki, a young boy who shut himself in. Like most fangame protagonists, Katatsuki refuses to leave his room and prefers to explore his dreams instead of reality.

Physicality is a very traditional fangame, so many of its aspects are related to events/locations/themes in the original Yume Nikki. It features bright, childish and colorful themes along with dark, violent and bizarre ones. It has three endings.

name: Reap and Sow
description:
Reap and Sow is a non-traditional Yume Nikki fangame. In many aspects, it is very reminiscent of well-known farming games like Harvest Moon.

In Reap and Sow you take care of a farm during the day. You start with almost nothing except a few seeds, and from there you must expand with more plants and even livestock. You raise crops, care for animals and befriend the locals in town.

There is also another part to this game that is vastly different from the farming. That is, what happens during night time. You explore your dream world. The dream world will be a huge world with everything from factories with robots to magic forests with faeries and everything in between.

The dream world will eventually tie into the real world and you can use some crops that you grow in your farm to affect the dream world (mostly the mushrooms you can grow later). Some items from the real world can also be used in the dream world. The dream world and its inhabitants will be suitably abstract and probably won’t make sense most of the time.

name: Returning Nightmares
description: Returning Nightmares is an exploration adventure-horror game, inspired by Yume Nikki and it's multiple fan-made homages (but with dialogue & easier to navigate maps). You play as Akira, a young man locked up in his own bedroom, exploring his dreams to remember the events that lead him to where he is now. But some things are better left alone…

name: Shirushi
description: Shirushi is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. You start as Yatsuki, a girl who refuses to leave her room. She can travel to the dream world by sleeping on her bed. Her main task is to collect Stoicheios in certain dream worlds.

name: Gifts from Arthur
description:
Small sweet surprises for the neighborhood children.

A game inspired by To Kill a Mockingbird, made for the Novels That Shaped Our World jam.

name: Silent Infinity
description: Silent Infinity is a English Yume Nikki fangame. The fangame is unique in having a dominant ocean theme. You play as Umitsuki and explore her dream world, the goal of the game being to find effects. Along with saving, the player can change the computer's wallpaper or play a minigame.

name: The Hauntings: Surveillance
description: Welcome to the Directive Seven Bravo surveillance team. There's an office that's been experiencing paranormal events. Your task is to scan through various cameras set up throughout the building and document as many activities as possible. Be warned: this assignment is of high importance and If you miss too many activities, or report improper activities, you will be fired.

name: Yume Nikki Ver. 1.00
description:
Yume Nikki ver. 1.00 is an English Yume Nikki mod developed by 369071 2458. This is an expansion mod that adds a number of new areas and events to the game, along with an alternate ending.

The gameplay remains the same as the original. The player enters the dream world by sleeping in the bed. The main objective of the game also remains the same; the player must obtain all of the effects by exploring the dream world to unlock one of two endings.

name: Guardian of the Code
description: Guardian of the Code is a visual novel designed to teach about internet safety and general cyber security concepts. The target audience is for 12-18 year olds but anyone can benefit from staying safe online!

name: Mario Kart RiiBalanced
description: Mario Kart RiiBalanced is a mod for Mario Kart Wii that balances the states of very vehicle, character, modifies item probability, harder CPUs, edits textures and music, adds Toad Circuit from Mario Kart 7 and changes to the existing tracks to make the game more evenly balanced.

name: Heartstrings
description: Heartstrings is a game about building a web of hearts by connecting them together to create a resilient network.

name: Playing With Fire 2
description: Select the number of players and level to start the game. Blow up your opponents using bombs before they manage to kill you. Destroy blocks to leave behind power-ups which will give you special abilities when picked up. Each player has three lives so they will need to be killed three times to be eliminated. There is a 3-minute time limit in place. If you win a game, you will score the number of seconds remaining on the timer multiplied by 250, times the number of opponents in the game. Losing a game will result in that amount of points being subtracted from your score.

name: KoiGig: Devil x Angel
description: KoiGig: Devil x Angel is an otome game, developed and published by TwoFive, which was released in Japan in 2007.

name: Starry Sky: Spring Stories
description: Starry * Sky: Spring Stories is a port for the Playstation Vita of both Starry Sky: In Spring and Starry Sky: After Spring.

name: Angelic Vale
description:
Angelic Vale is a fully-voiced tactical RPG in which the story and battles are divided into chapters and are accessed by traveling to a territory on the World Map. Each character has a set of special skills and magic and their MP is slightly restored after each turn. Players can also buy and assign additional troops to each character which can chain attacks. Unfortunately, items gained during battles can't be sold.

Each character levels up separately after defeating an enemy and, depending on how well the player fought during a battle, they can get rare items and extra gold. The game has 3 difficulty levels and the harder the difficulty level is, the more items the player can acquire after each battle. Some of the levels can be replayed to gain additional items and experience.

The game takes place in the kingdom of Belluna which is still healing from the scars of a civil war that took place a decade ago. The rookie knight Ogil and his childhood friend Fio fall witness to the assassination of the king of Belluna by rebellion soldiers from the neighboring Jerenia Republic. Despite losing the king and being torn between both sides of the conflict, the hero makes his own choices of what to fight for. However, the path the heroes have chosen will be filled with blood, darkness and significant changes to their beloved homeland.

name: Super Mario World: The Second Reality Project - Reloaded
description:
"The Second Reality Project" one of the most complete Super Mario World-Romhacks

Bowser is back again, more powerful than times ago:
He found a power source which let him rebuilt his Airship Fleet. Soon he plans on attacking the Mushroom Kingdom one time more! It's up to Mario to stop him!

name: Super Mario World: The Second Reality Project 2 - Zycloboo's Challenge
description: This is the sequel to the "Second Reality Project", which is something different from the first part. This game features new GFX, some new custom blocks and custom sprites, a new overworld map and different music. The game contains a lot of ripped GFX from other games like "Super Mario Land 2 & 3", "Sonic 1 & 2", "Alfred Chicken" and much more.

name: Super Impostor Bros.
description: Super Impostor Bros. is an Among Us fangame made for the GameBoy Color.

name: Friday Night Funkin': Vs Impostor
description: VS. Impostor is a mod that adds four new weeks revolving around the popular video game from 2018, Among Us.

name: Cycle
description: A short game about Melbourne, urban legends, tunnels and the workers that dig them... and what lies underground.

name: Mars for the Rich
description: Infest the rats nest.

name: Owarinaki Natsu, Towa Naru Shirabe
description:
In Kyushu, there lies the small village of Sunomura. In that small village, four childhood friends, Touma Takumi, Ogami Ritsuko, Amamiya Kanon, and Takanashi Mio comprise a small music club at the village school. One day, Takumi happens to see and hear the violin performance of Orihara Ai, a girl who recently moved to the village and transferred into the school. This performance later eventually causes Ritsuko to resolve to recruit Ai into their music club no matter what.

However, one day, one of the childhood friends is separated from the other three, but before doing so passes on her role of "Supervisor" to Takumi. Later, they learn that the school they all attend is going to be closed down in one month due to a government-ordered evacuation of the village. Everyone resolves to make their last month together as memorable and enjoyable as possible before the school closes down...

name: The Instruction Manual
description: Instruction manual for having sex in space. A homage to a tale of the same name by Julio Cortázar.

name: CamGirls Inc
description: CamGirls Inc – an exciting simulator where you have to become the owner of an advertising agency that cooperates with models from online chats. The user opens his own business and can invite the most beautiful girls to his own team to do online broadcasts. In order to sign a contract with cute and charming girls, you must first conduct an interview, as well as collect a portfolio of potential participants. The most charming, outstanding and cute beauties will go on streams. There can be many viewers and fans to earn money. Therefore, bringing income to the campaign owner, who at that moment simply watches what is happening is the main target.

name: Guess Pony Cartoon
description: This is a nice trivia game where you have to guess the Cartoon character in pony cartoons. Try to guess them all with just four segments of a larger image.

name: Fluttershy Piano Tiles
description:
Do you really like songs of fluttershy Style ?
There are many choices of songs Fluttershy from equestria girls in this piano Game. You can play the piano from the songs Fluttershy style game here, as well as to entertain yourself and those around you, enjoy the PIANO music of the song, calm yourself, and train your finger speed in this PIANO Game.

name: Drainus
description: This is a side-scrolling shooting game in which you take control of the "Drainus", the Kharlal Empire's most cutting-edge fighter with the ability to absorb energy bullets, and take down the enemy ships zipping through space.

name: Kiniro Mosaic Memories
description: Sin descripción

name: It's A Me
description: Poor Keke has gotten themselves in a pickle (several times?)! Guide Me through increasingly nasty obstacles while collecting coins in this tricky platformer. Controls are explained in-game; press Enter to start the game.

name: Rocket League: Season 1
description: The Season 1 Series include more than a dozen new items from Rare and Very Rare Decals and Wheels like the Bodacious Octane Decal and Shortquarter Wheels, to Black Market items like the Stipple Gait Decal and the extremely animated Buffy-Sugo Goal Explosion!

name: Picokaiju
description: You are one big monster with an appetite for destruction. This turn-based rogue-like PICO-8 game is all about that stomping, smashing, grabbing, and chomping your way through a procedurally generated hapless city and its tiny citizens.

name: Notpron
description:
Notpron is an online puzzle game and internet riddle created in 2004 by German game developer David Münnich. It has been hailed by fans, journalists, and Münnich himself as "the hardest riddle available on the internet".

Regarded as one of the first of the online puzzle game genre, Notpron follows a standard puzzle game layout, where the player is presented with a webpage containing a riddle and must find the answer to the riddle in order to proceed to the next webpage.

name: Youngblood: Search and Destroy
description: Youngblood: Search and Destroy is an isometric action game that was originally scheduled for being published for PC and Sony PlayStation in November 1997. However, the PC version has been postponed to May 1998 while the PlayStation version was pushed back to an undisclosed date.

name: Doors: Origins
description: Earth as we know it is now on a path of destruction. A sky of constantly shifting colors, floods in places where the rain never stops, and when the snow falls it is gray. All seemed lost until we discovered a mysterious portal. An outstanding 3D puzzle escape game that you don't want to miss!

name: Mandrake Boys
description: Mandrake Boys is a mobile game, available on iOS and Android.

name: Mandrake Girls: Garden of Secret
description: Mandrake Girls is a mobile game by Owlogue.

name: Hop Step Idol
description: Hop Step Idol * is a otome game, published by Media Entertainment, which was released in Japan in 1997 for the Sega Saturn.

name: Nauka Prediel
description: A sovietic detective narrative game based on 1970s. You can interact and inspect objects and there are multiple endings.

name: Friday Night Funkin': vs. Evil Otto
description: Boyfriend is stuck in an arcade, causing him to face Evil Otto. Don't let him become another victim of the Evil Otto curse!

name: All Monsters Attack!
description:
The City of Townsville... is under attack!

Hideous monsters are attacking Little Tokyo from all sides.Help the Powerpuff Girls defeat them by operating the Dynamic nanotechtronic monobot,other wise known as Dynamo,created especially for such monster-attacking occasions by the professor.

name: Nuclear Rush
description: Nuclear Rush is an unreleased Sega Mega Drive tank combat game for use with the Sega VR headset, developed by FutureScape Productions and slated to be published by Sega. Intended to be the hardware’s pack-in game, it features gameplay similar to Battlezone and Stellar-Fire.

name: Pokémon Island
description: This is a Pokémon fan game with the main mechanics, but with a different approach on Pokémon Island. There is a new concept of linearity for the franchise because almost nothing is essential to move forward, but still there are many challenges.

name: Second Soul
description:
Aphwoakah is very lonely, Aphwoakah wants to make friends. Help Aphwoakah find some friends, so Aphwoakah isn't lonely anymore.

Go on an epic journey across the valley in search of friends for Aphwoakah.

Meet many unique, exciting potential friends.

Encounter thrilling places in which friends may be found.

name: Locomotion
description:
Locomotion is an arcade-puzzle game in which you are presented with a top-down view of a railway network with a number of stations and junctions. Trains are released from stations at random intervals, each with a destination station. Your job is to get a set number of them to this destination within a time limit.

You control a cursor which can click on each of the junctions, toggling their positions. When trains reach a junction which is not set in a direction they can move through, they will stop until you move it. When they reach the wrong station they simply reverse and continue. If two trains make contact, they are lost, and a penalty is accrued.

name: 25th Anniversary Super Mario Bros.
description: A special commemorative version of Super Mario Bros., for its 25th anniversary. It doesn't have many differences from the original game aside for cosmetic changes.

name: Friday Night Funkin': Mario's Madness
description: Friday Night Funkin': Mario's Madness is a Friday Night Funkin' mod based on various creepypastas around the world of Super Mario, each one has their own song, ready to battle with you, Being 7 in total, including cutscenes.

name: Project MSfiX'D
description: Project MSfiX'D improves over the original Project MSX with fixes for objective bugs (Orion using deprecated form of A_RailAttack) and player options like auto-reloading, HUD element opacity, etc. Also built-in cross-IWAD support.

name: Friday Night Funkin': VS. Starlight Glimmer & Trixie
description: Boyfriend and Girlfriend found a portal to Equestria...

name: Paw Patrol: Grand Prix
description: No track is too big, no racer too small! The PAW Patrol are on their fastest mission yet – To win the Pup Cup! Race around iconic locations including Adventure Bay, Jake’s Snowboarding Resort and The Jungle in this 4-player-championship to find out who will be crowned the winner.

name: DreamWorks Dragons: Legends of the Nine Realms
description: Unleash your inner dragon and fly beyond the Hidden World, on a fiery adventure to rescue Thunder’s family and save the dragon kingdoms!

name: Star Trek Prodigy: Supernova
description: After the U.S.S. Protostar picks up strange readings from a dying star, Dal and Gwyn must race against time to save their friends, their ship, and an entire planetary system before a supernova destroys them all! Using their unique skills to overcome ingenious puzzles, endure hostile environments and battle deadly robot armies, Dal and Gwyn must save their captured crewmates Jankom Pog, Rok-Tahk, Zero, and Murf. But they soon encounter a deadly new enemy, one that will stop at nothing to destroy the U.S.S. Protostar and change the very course of history!

name: Farming Simulator 19: Ambassador Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Cursed Travels: Sunken City
description: A dark puzzle game featuring intriguing mysteries, a unique artstyle, and skeletons. Platform your way through haunted forests, cursed ruins, dark mountains, and more, searching for the mythical Sunken City to solve its ancient puzzles.

name: Pentomino
description: "Pandomino" is also known as "brain racking twelve pieces". It is a hardcore spatial logic puzzle game suitable for young and old. The rules is very simple but challenging. Can you find the secret of the solution? NP->P? Find Your Way!

name: Bowerwhelm
description: Bowerwhelm is an FPS Rogue-like game with minimalist graphics. Kill until you die, upgrade the skills, make powerful builds, and kill more!

name: Age of Empires III: Definitive Edition - Knights of the Mediterranean
description: Knights of the Mediterranean brings a wealth of new content to Age of Empires III: Definitive Edition, including the addition of the Italy and Malta Civilizations, the new Tycoon Game Mode, and 8 Historical Maps.

name: Road Trip
description: Road Trip is a road trip simulator. In the game you will find beautiful locations, interesting levels, as well as various weather phenomena!

name: Bark
description: Bark is a psychological/survival horror experience from the perspective of a small, innocent Jack-Russel Terrier living in an abusive household. Maintain your instinctual needs and desires as you try desperately to escape the house in which you have been forced to call home.

name: Unbearable
description: A story inspired by old school survival horror. Play alone or together on split screen. Delve into dark environments; hide or run; fight melee or with guns; climb and solve puzzles to discover the story of Unbearable.

name: Arth Island
description: Gather resources, set up a camp, choose your class, level up your skills, don't die of cold or starvation and battle the other failed experiments to survive as long as possible on this procedurally generated island

name: A-Mazing Enigmas
description: After venturing into the Trials of Old, help three characters traverse puzzle rooms using the world and the skills unique to each one of them. Guide them to the end of these trails and get the treasures that are held within.

name: I Commissioned Some Bees
description: The brief was simple. Artists were commissioned to create a fantasy world, and hide as many bees as they can inside it. Now it’s your job to find them all! With 10 art pieces to choose from, and 1000+ bees, you will have a lot of searching to do.

name: Ares Virus2
description: The "Ares Virus" series of games is widely acclaimed for its unique combat and individual style of painting. Now that the sequel is back, it will give you an unprecedented experience.

name: The Twilight of Infinity Episode 2 - Attack on the Hydro Processor
description: An explosion in 2041 will lead to an investigation at the Mesa Hydro Processor. Why would anyone blow up a civilian facility, and who could be behind it?

name: Beat! After the Summer
description: Spread your wings, after the summer sky.

name: War Commander
description: Super shocking military strategy game world! Lots of weapons and combat effects. Collect more advanced commanders and build weapons and equipment. Loot resources, build military units, and pass various interesting levels. Legion battle, you can attack other players.

name: Ultimate Fighters
description: 2D Fighting game

name: PlayForm: Human Dynamics
description: PlayForm: Human Dynamics is an Experimental Physics Sandbox focused on Active Ragdoll simulation. Use a variety of tools and obstacles that can push, pull, or smash these simulated humans in many diverse worlds.

name: Meowtopia: Expedition
description: “Meowtopia: Expedition” is a cat-themed and heart-warming Match 3 game. Join and experience the urban fairy tale between Xiaoxiao and “Toffee” the cat, dress yourself up with a cat-themed fashion style, and decorate your own cozy home!

name: Jigsaw Puzzle: Swingers Party
description: Challenging jigsaw puzzles, featuring adult images of 2 couples at a swingers party on a yacht.

name: Farming Simulator 22: Kubota Pack
description: Extend the agricultural fleet of your farm with new vehicles and tools by Kubota, the multinational corporation that originated from Osaka, Japan!

name: TS Marketplace: CSX Scenario Pack 02
description: Now, CSX Scenario Pack 02, from developer High Iron Simulations, brings the drama and diversity of CSX railroading to Train Simulator with ten authentic career scenarios that re-create the railroading of CSX and its predecessors on three popular Train Simulator routes!

name: Eschew
description: Eschew is a bullet hell action adventure where you play as an unknown alien visitor, traveled to Earth in search of a stolen, cosmic power source. Survive the overwhelming onslaught of Earth's military might!

name: Castle Greyrot
description: Castle Greyrot is a challenging boss-rush rogue-lite turn-based RPG that revolves around killing brutal bosses, a lot. Train your party members to overcome the horrors of Castle Greyrot and its unending curse... If you can!

name: Final Front
description: On this fantastic continent, let's go on an adventure with your companions

name: Cave VR
description: Cave is the original VR puzzle game, looking for a journey of exploration in the ancient mysterious cave ruins, the ruins of the ancient inhabitants are from the exit ruins in layers, and the horse-hunting treasure hunt on the road seems to imply on.

name: Saving Sheep
description: Saving Sheep - a simple 2D arcade shooter. The player is a shepherd, saving the lives of sheep and his own, fighting off a large pack of wolves.

name: Belarus Simulator: Preemptive Strike
description: You are the ruler of a democratic independent state of Belarus. Unfortunately, you receive troubled news. An act of aggression is planned against your country. You need to do everything in your power to stop it.

name: Drunk or Dead 2
description: Immerse yourself in the virtual nightmare of Drunk or Dead 2, a post-apocalyptic VR world where you and your crew fight to survive against a nearly endless zombie horde with the help of a little booze and a whole truckload of high-powered guns.

name: Memorabilia
description: Find notes and clues that will lead to memories. Change the present by manipulating your past. You must save your childhood friend in order to escape the mansion of memories.

name: The Journey: Episode 2 - Words of Wisdom
description: The second step that you never knew you needed to take to get to wherever you're wanting to go... You won't regret this experience. You have nothing to lose, and everything to gain...

name: Demons Crusher
description: Demons crusher is a side-scrolling platform slasher.

name: Democracy 4: Voting Systems
description: Frustrated that your voters seem too influenced by corporate donations? Eager to lower the minimum voting age? Perhaps you would like to ban election robo-calls, or maybe go the other direction and make corporate donations unlimited? All your voting and campaign problems are solved with this DLC!

name: Mechanical Sunset
description: A catastrophe is looming on the horizon -- threatening the existence of the Walking City of Machines, home to thousands of robots. You are its last hope, and the only solution is through machinery.

name: Re: Collector
description: I woke up in a mysterious forest. I had no idea who I was or why I was here. Then, I met some friends and went on an adventure...

name: TetriStory 110%
description: Sin descripción

name: The Riftbreaker: Metal Terror
description: Explore an entirely new area of Galatea 37 in this Story Campaign expansion for The Riftbreaker. Catalog new species. Craft new and unique weapons. Fight hordes of aliens unlike anything you've seen before.

name: Demonoire
description: Demonoire - A heroic 2D shooter, Rescue Senvil from the forces of evil.

name: Escape Simulator: Steampunk
description: This level pack includes four new escape rooms set on a beautiful airship "Valor".

name: The Misanthropic Girl
description: You control two protagonists at the same time in this action RPG, letting you combine their unique skills. Explore and discover in the seamless open world setting of a detailed Japanese town as you watch these two high schoolers learn what “existence” really means in this post-apocalyptic tale.

name: Cyber League Football
description: Futuristic robot football! Upgrade your team, call the plays, and drive your robots to victory on the field.

name: Graviators
description: Graviators is a team arena sports game in space! Compete against friends in pinball-like arenas.Use your spacepods special gravity and shield abilities to control and shoot the ball and score points on the enemy goal.Engage in multiple game modes and arenas with exciting gameplay!

name: Fung Guys
description: Fung Guys is an online multiplayer, team-based, party game, heavily focused on exciting PvP minigames.

name: Rivalry warlord Sengoku
description: A turn-based Sengoku simulation game that can be played by vassal!

name: Simon the Sorcerer Origins
description: Simon The Sorcerer Origins is the official prequel of the legendary Simon's adventure saga.
