Simon will return for the first time to the absurd world of the Sorcerers unleashing an ancient prophecy and gaining ancient magical powers. Prepare to experience a classic adventure in a modern way!

name: The Last Human is a Biker
description: The Last Human is a Biker is a few hours of pure entertainment. In this 2D shooter you play as John, the last human, and unleash his fury in his quest of vengeance! With unlimited item synergies, make the choices that will allow you to survive against countless swarms of aliens!

name: Pumpkin head
description: This game is a side-scrolling 2D action shooting game created with dot pictures. Control the main character, Pumpkin Head, as he runs through various stages such as the sea and the desert while battling the slime army!

name: Demons Happened
description: Demons Happened is a top down shooter with action/platforming elements. Play as a ghost as dead on the inside as he is on the outside, fighting demons with demons on a journey to fix your tv.

name: My Pet Sitter is a Futanari
description: Can your Pet Sitter teach an old dog new tricks? Are you willing to play nice? Good boy!

name: Galaxy Citizen: Beginning
description: You are heir to the empire,struggling to survive in the dark age in the galaxy.Fight against the Emperor. Galaxy Citizen is an Action RPG set in Space Opera world .Free to Play

name: Mad Bullz
description:
Now you have a chance to take revenge on those filthy people, and ram them with your horns.
It's up to you how you will fight, as you can control bull's movement with keyboard and rotate freely his head (neck) with a mouse.

name: Contrast
description: Death is inconsequential in this arcade-style roguelite with an artstyle inspired by early Atari consoles. But be careful with damaging the bloodied walls and floors, falling out of the level will bring you right back to the start of the stage.

name: Isolania
description: A plague called "The Sadness" has devastated civilization. A mysterious society rose from the ashes, deciding the only way to protect its citizens is to confine them in cells. There are 3 Edicts governing this new civilization: Stay in your cell. Watch television. Never talk about the outside.

name: King
description: This is a game that combines strategy, tactics and role-playing. You travel to a magical world and become a king. You will manage your own country and conquer the world through diplomacy and war.

name: Mortmentum
description: Fight endless waves of different enemies using your grappling hook in clever ways while trying hopelessly to stay alive just a little longer so you can get a higher score.

name: Who is the Red Queen?
description: Alice, Alice, the Red Queen is missing. The queen has been dismembered and Alice must find all her pieces. A horror-fantasy yuri visual novel filled with death, love, and forgotten memories.

name: Beer Factory
description: Beer Factory is a business simulation and management game. Take the challenge, manage your own beer factory, employees, production lines, import and export of the merchandise.

name: Super Arkanoid
description: "Super Arkanoid" is a relatively relaxing casual game. The player controls a horizontal board to block the falling ball.

name: Date Ariane Remastered
description: The original western dating sim updated and bigger than ever before. The first dating sim made with 3D rendered graphics became a viral web classic back in 2007. This new "remastered" version allows players to play as a male or female for the first time.

name: Fault: Stp - Lightkravte
description: Fault: Stp - Lightkravte is the latest entry in the fault series, which has shipped over 500,000 copies worldwide. Lightkravte presents its story through the eyes of Khaji Oberg, an ordinary and unremarkable teenaged boy who finds himself reaching for a dream that slips ever further away from him.

name: Night Out
description: Night Out is a cooperative online multiplayer action puzzle platformer for 1-4 players. With both a online mode and solo mode, this game will deliver smiles and laughs...

name: Silent World
description: Get rid of fatigue in Silent World! Listen to relaxing music and casual skateboarding in the sunset or early morning. It’s just a simple 2D pixel game.

name: Babushka's Glitch Dungeon Crystal
description: Hi so much! You are a little old lady who needs to clean up a big magical cellar. Learn colorful mind-bending spells, or just hit stuff with your broom.

name: Elegies: Aya
description: After losing his parents and barely escaping his burning home, Zach wakes up in the hospital where he meets Aya, the ghost of a girl. Who is she, and why can only Zach see her? Together they try to investigate Aya's past, which quickly awakens new dangers.

name: God Edge
description: Travel across Azmra and slay barons using the God Edge; A sword capable of transferring power from the slain to the slayer!

name: Peacemaker: Glorious Princess
description: A classic JRPG. Play the role of a princess, gather partners in a desperate situation, and embark on a legendary journey to save the kingdom and make peace.

name: The Robot Girl Meets the Human!
description: This is an adventure game that takes you on a journey through a world after humans have disappeared. Lead the robot girl "Scarlet" to find the surviving humans.

name: Bioxotica
description: Cultivate an exotic homestead - Bioxotica! Grow a ranch of peculiar plants and collectible creatures. Create structures and grand habitats. Will you discover the secrets of this wild land and create a flourishing settlement for the inhabitants on this exotic frontier?

name: Best of Eleven
description: Puzzle game about finding patterns. Create your own set or randomize the rules to explore almost unlimited amount of gameplays.

name: Panzer Corps 2: Axis Operations - 1943
description: The critical hour where the fate of Germany on the Eastern Front will be decided has arrived! Though the Battle of Stalingrad has ended, the Axis forces in Russia remain in turmoil.

name: Last Meow Standing
description: This lightning fast arena shooter brings you right back to the highscore hunts of the arcade era. Use your arsenal of deadly weapons wisely against the increasingly ferocious monster hordes to survive as long as you can.

name: Zombie Scream
description: Terror descends on a Let's Play creator... Zombie Scream, the 2020 collaboration between the Tsugunohi corrosion-of-daily-life horror series and Japanese video creator Odaken, is finally available on Steam. How about experiencing a taste of the strange new world yourself?

name: Grid Words
description: The next generation of word games has arrived…

name: Something Strange
description: Go about your normal every day life and meet new friends in this short visual novel!

name: Old Gods
description: It looks like you have died. But neither heaven nor hell await you. Assigned a fate from the two creators you will be sent back to life with the task of overthrowing the false gods. Exciting fights, difficult puzzles and a colorful world of different creatures await you.

name: Bathotel
description: Step into the everchanging, claustrophobic world of Batho[tel]. After losing everything, including your own body, you find yourself walking through a hotel which seems familiar but eerily unwelcoming. Solve puzzles, avoid death, and learn about other guests as you explore the repeating world.

name: Insect Swarm
description: The swarm is a swarm of thousands of alien zerg, and you, as the only survivor of this wasteland, you need to face them and fight with blood, good luck!

name: Maid Idle
description: You are now a tavern owner in an incredible magical world filled with wonderful maids to hire! Each one is ready to have lots of fun and new experiences with you! Are you ready to manage all of her hearts?

name: Cazzarion: Demon Hunting
description: Demons are troubling here. Kill the brood of evil and send it back to hell. Standard weapons (Assault Rifle, Shotgun) and special weapons (BoomShot, Reaper, ....) are available. As opponents, the demons of hell are fighting against you. Choose your weapon and shoot ("Groarrr.....BOOOOOM")

name: Upirja
description: Upirja is a first-person horror adventure set in the late 19th century in the Balkans. A murky evil distresses the lives of the villagers of a remote region surrounded by snowy mountains. Your mission, as inspector of the King, is to rid these lands from the ghoul that haunts them.

name: Pleim
description: An open world adventure game. You can move around the city, talk to residents, and investigate cases. The game has an interesting plot that will not leave anyone indifferent.

name: Frog lands
description: Solve riddles, go through dangerous traps and overthrow the dark magician!

name: CinemApocalypse
description: In CinemApocalypse, you have the choice of simply watching a movie on your Big Screen VR, or playing survival mode, and trying to save as many citizens as possible.

name: One
description: In the world of "One" Action Third Person Shooter, fighters with enhanced combat suit get bigger and stronger for every kill they get.

name: Cute Waifu
description: Move all parts to form the complete image.

name: Heaven Snakes
description: A new generation of a Snake arcade game with unique mechanics, fully in 3D and online! [Beta]

name: Dark Slime
description: Go through a huge number of caves, solve many puzzles, and fight against the strongest enemies!

name: Touhou Crisis
description: Classic arcade nostalgia and modern-indie design collide in this shooting-gallery boss battler! Play as a one-man army in offline solo OR bring a friend in online co-op/versus mode! Supports Mouse AND Lightgun play!

name: Canterz Paranormies
description: Canterz Paranormies is a 2D Top Down survival horror game based on the story of the most renowned paranormal investigation team of the US called "Canterz Paranormies" who got a request from the owner of the Texas Haunted house to investigate it for the paranormal evidence.

name: Rue La Résistance
description: Rue | la résistance is the third project of the RVT studio, which tells about the life of a group of partisans operating in the territory of occupied France. The game is based on the principle of a theatrical production: it is based on the play "Ghost Sonata" by August Strindberg

name: My Hero One's Justice 2: Pack 10 Yuga Aoyama
description: Play as Yuga Aoyama in MY HERO ONE'S JUSTICE 2! This pack also includes 10 color variations for Yuga Aoyama's costume.

name: Refuge: Into the Unknown
description: In the Industrial Age, forced to work cleaning chimneys from Birmingham's houses, a boy named George decides to run away from his shelter into the unknown hoping to find a better place to live. Help him getting away from the city and face the challenges that will be found in the journey.

name: Put Pud Nudli's Adventure
description: Become a hero who saves the island of cats. Explore these varied areas of this island. Fight Chef The Cat’s creatures and after that face the meowing horror. The game is hard, but if you can give it time, you will become better and better.

name: Grimland
description: "Grimland" is a classic 2D side-scrolling platform slasher. The kingdom was attacked by monsters and you have to free the queen and return peace and security to the lands of Grimland.

name: Lights Off!
description: Play through a common childhood fear about turning the lights off and going to bed.

name: Incursion
description: Incursion is an indie FPS that aims for a unique wave survival experience with class-based combat for both co-op and singleplayer. Fight alongside strangers or friends and take advantage of unique team compositions, upgrade choices, and strategies to win in this solo-developed indie title.

name: Kedama's Adventure
description: A Story about Kedama in Gensokyo. This is a fan game basedon Touhou Project.

name: Momentum
description: Momentum is a 2 KB highscore chaser about amassing nukes

name: Goddess of Card War 2
description: "Goddess of Card War 2" is a card game with classical Chinese graphics. Each card has different skills and attributes. Players need to collect more cards to grow their team.

name: ParaPerspective
description: ParaPerspective is a stylish and minimalist puzzle game where your perspective affects how the world works. Help the little guys get to their destination by rotating the camera and directing them through seemingly impossible geometry.

name: Zeus Quest: The Rebirth of Earth
description: Help Zeus save the planet in one heck of a crazy and hilarious family adventure. A classic point and click adventure game safe for kids. It combines Greek Mythology with Sci-Fi in a funny way!

name: Magiterra
description: Magiterra is a farming simulator game with RTS controls. With a little bit of added fantasy elements, create your crop fields, produce hundreds of resources, fulfill many different missions, help your kingdom prosper and live in wealth!

name: Treats Please!
description: This is a retro-styled puzzle game about keeping a hungry pet happy with tasty treats. Choosing treats the pet will enjoy will reduce their hunger strength level and choosing things they cannot eat will only make them hungrier!

name: Fray Fight
description: Fray Fight is free! Battle the evil hordes on your way to Valhalla. Annihilate thousands of monsters with overpowered attacks and upgrades.

name: Castle Reborn
description: "Castle Reborn" - old school 2D slasher. In this game you slash your enemies, dodge attacks and use the ancient magic against monsters. Try to survive in a mysterious castle, that is getting more and more dangerous.

name: MonGirl Expedition
description: Jack’s simple life ends on his birthday with a surprise. He ends up in an unknown land full of monster girls with a task from the Goddess herself. Will he be able to impress her? Duke it out in dynamic real-time combat, solve puzzles, meet girls, and conquer their hearts!

name: Sword of Jade: Parallel Dreams
description: A lengthy fantasy adventure role playing game based around a day/night cycle, customizing your heroes, and a storyline where every choice has an impact on the story. Upgraded from it's original MS-DOS release to run natively on all platforms with QOL updates!

name: Automata Ecosystem: Cellular Automata Simulation
description: Turning cellular automata into an audiovisual experience. Automata Ecosystem is a GPU-powered cellular automata simulation with complex interactions and procedural audio generation.

name: The Overlord Isn't Another Isekai Protagonist, Is He?: Chapter 1
description: Have you ever wondered what awaits you after death? At 25, Kay had no plans to die... let alone to wake up in literal HELL one day. Did he deserve such a fate, or is it all just a ridiculous mistake? Kay can’t remember his past, but he firmly believes that he doesn't belong here.

name: Piggy Jump
description: Here is the Hardest game ever made! Game about Piggy, who is a basketball player with a dream to defeat everyone. Jump, Dodge, Dunk and Fly with Piggy to complete all 45 Levels and mini games. Piggy Jump is a big challenge for thos who like difficult games!

name: Stonedef
description: You have to fight off waves of enemies using magic staves.

name: Ever Seen A Cat? 2
description: A relaxing hidden object game. Find even more cats in several stylish environments! Every play through is different!

name: Ragdoll Funhouse
description: Play a fully physical, humanoid ragdoll and explore a indoor funhouse. Swing from ropes on the ceiling, make your way up climbing walls, or be bounced about by rollers. Test your mastery of our physical controls in the time trials around the map, or just enjoy your time challenging the obstacles.

name: MechWarrior 5: Mercenaries - Call to Arms
description: Call to Arms adds the Hatchetman chassis, along with 23 new melee-weapon focused 'Mech variants, 5 new melee weapon-focused Hero 'Mechs, 9 new melee weapons, and the new animated Stormsurge skin.

name: Futanari Sex - The New Boss
description: An explicit erotic visual novel following the story of an overbearing new futanari boss doing her best to intimidate the all-female personnel in her first day at work.

name: Sex Chess
description: Hell is about to get invaded and the sinners trapped inside are about to be freed. But the clueless liberators had no idea how cunning the Devil is. This time, the war between Light and Darkness will be waged not on the battlefield, but on a chess board.

name: Bonelords
description: Build up yourself & your defenses in Bonelords! Defend against waves of enemies! Attack using a large variety of weapons & tools! Scale your power, and face the great hordes of Spegroon!

name: Apparitions
description: Apparitions is a 4 player co-op ghost hunting game. Figure out how to communicate with the other side. Use the equipment to find out what type of ghost you and you're team are dealing with and determine how to exorcise it accordingly or help it pass on peacefully.

name: Galaxy Citizen
description: Galaxy Citizen is an online Action RPG set in an Alien world.

name: Drums Rock
description: Drums Rock is an arcade drums game for VR, follow the rhythm of rock with your drums and smash the demons. Live a unique campaign: with different levels, challenges, songs and worlds. Drums Rock is an ideal game to feel like a rock hero, while destroying hordes of demons to the rhythm of rock!

name: Dreadful Hours
description: Dreadful Hours is a fast paced time managing survival horror game where multiple creatures are trying to attack you at every point. You must watch the cameras and then decide your next moves while using as little power as possible.

name: Office Run
description: Free and exclusively on PC! Office Run is an endless runner game built around the office theme with 6 playable characters, leveling system, skills, upgrades, power-up items and online highscores. Start as new Intern in the company and move up the ladder until you become the next CEO!

name: Shark Assault Simulator
description: I don't think you'd want to rest on that beach. Shark Assault Simulator is a game that shows us how dangerous it is to sunbathe on an unknown beach.

name: Aces Under the Moonlight
description: Smack your ball in your opponent's goal. Run, jump, and airdash your way to victory in this hand animated, high speed, punk-inspired ball game set against backgrounds of urban decay. Get ready an absolutely electric experience.

name: Space Menace
description: Space Menace is a real-time sci-fi space exploration and space battle game. You play as a space captain, seeking fortune and glory as you see fit. War rages across the galaxy. Factions are fighting for total dominance. Survive and thrive in these chaotic times.

name: Jelly Forest
description: Help the cube jump over the steep rocks and get as far as possible before he loses all his three hearts

name: Potato Arena
description: Potato Party is a Party Game in which you are playing with total of 4 players. Lots of fun and challenging parkour maps are waiting for you to discover and overcome! Grab your keyboard or favourite gamepad, and join the party!

name: Eden Island
description: Eden Island is a realistic-style survival game. As a survivor, you will explore and survive on a beautiful tropical island, craft weapons against beasts, farm and hunt, build your own home.

name: Project Gunship
description: Rain hell on the enemy from 12,000 feet in an AC-130 Gunship. Project Gunship provides an authentic and historical simulation of combat in all gunship variants from Vietnam to present day.

name: Employee of the Month
description: An atmospheric retro inspired survival horror game. Enjoy the late shift at 'The Month' in an abstract and unsettling night of terror, spooks and convenience.

name: Neodori Forever
description: Neodori Forever is a retro inspired, endless arcade 3D racing game inspired by the beloved old classics. A colorful cast of rivals is waiting to race against you on a variety of vibrant environments. Collect power ups and coins on the way to expand your car collection and outrun the competition.

name: Bot Brigade
description: Dexter and Mandark are preparing for battle in the Bot Arena. They each possess an arsenal of high-tech robots programmed to smash each other to pieces. Playing as Dexter, launch your bots across the board and try to break through Mandark`s barrier on the other side. Once you`re throught the barrier, you win!

name: What if your girl was a frog?
description: There was a frog. She was cheerfully croaking on her lake. However, she was not a simple frog, but magic. And so she got a lonely boy. She used her magic and started her adventures.

name: Robo Legend
description: Robo Legend is a twin-stick shooter RPG where you blast your way through hordes of crazy robots, minigames, and puzzles. Choose to save Gear Town, or conquer it, when Voidbot and his forces invade.

name: Ticklish Tessa
description: Ticklish Tessa is a short interactive erotic BDSM game focused on tickling, pleasurable teasing, foot worship, and bondage in a consensual and playful setting.

name: Square Journey
description: Square Journey is a minimalist arcade game that aims to help Square reach the depths of his inner dungeon in search of a greater understanding of himself.

name: Plank Road
description: "Plank road simulation" is a game that allows you to enjoy easy and free simulation of plank road construction. By following the construction method of Chinese traditional frame structure and combining various building elements, To create our own legendary plank road journey.

name: Twofold
description: In a bid to avoid failing out of college, Olive Penn inadvertently finds themselves caught in the middle of a feud between two campus club leaders whose rivalry seemingly threatens to tear their friendship apart.

name: The Fright Before Christmas
description: Help Billy, Mandy and Grim destroy the evil toys that have taken over Santa's toyshop.

name: Flood Runner 5
description: Flood runner 5 is the fifth game in the very popular Flood Runner series. This game has added all the improvements from the previous games but has also added improvements of it’s own to make it one of the best games in the series.

name: Blood Burger
description:
Marco and his friend Thales are opening a hamburger shop but they don't know anything about cooking. So they decide to go after a secret hamburger formula in an abandoned "ShitDonalds" factory.

But what they don't expect is that the old factory's mascot is still there.
